languages.text: Впрочем, не мне одному изменило сердце в тот момент. Многие матросы, услышав призыв светлейш{mf|его|ей} Лорд-капитана начать ремонт корабля, помышляли не о своем долге, а лишь о том, как поскорее покинуть судно.

traits.locale_text: Впрочем, не мне одному изменило сердце в тот момент. Многие матросы, услышав призыв светлейш{mf|его|ей} Лорда-Капитана начать ремонт корабля, помышляли не о своем долге, а лишь о том, как поскорее покинуть судно.

languages.text: However, I was not the only one to have a change of heart in that moment. Many crew members, upon hearing our illustrious Lord Captain's command to begin repairs, thought not upon their duty, but on the fastest way to abandon ship.
languages.original_text: Впрочем, не мне одному изменило сердце в тот момент. Многие матросы, услышав призыв светлейш{mf|его|ей} Лорд-капитана начать ремонт корабля, помышляли не о своем долге, а лишь о том, как поскорее покинуть судно.

traits.locale_text: However, I was not the only one to have a change of heart in that moment. Many crew members, upon hearing our illustrious Lord Captain's command to begin repairs, thought not upon their duty, but on the fastest way to abandon ship.

However, I was not the only one to have a change of heart in that moment. Many crew members, upon hearing our illustrious Lord Captain's command to begin repairs, thought not upon their duty, but on the fastest way to abandon ship.

However, I was not the only one to have a change of heart in that moment. Many crew members, upon hearing our illustrious Lord Captain's command to begin repairs, thought not upon their duty, but on the fastest way to abandon ship.

However, I was not the only one to have a change of heart in that moment. Many crew members, upon hearing our illustrious Lord Captain's command to begin repairs, thought not upon their duty, but on the fastest way to abandon ship.

languages.text: Sin embargo, no fui el único que cambió de opinión en ese momento. Muchos tripulantes, oyendo la orden de{mf|l| la} ilustre L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} de iniciar las reparaciones, pensaron en la forma más rápida de evacuar en vez de en su deber.
languages.original_text: However, I was not the only one to have a change of heart in that moment. Many crew members, upon hearing our illustrious Lord Captain's command to begin repairs, thought not upon their duty, but on the fastest way to abandon ship.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, no fui el único que cambió de opinión en ese momento. Muchos tripulantes, oyendo la orden de{mf|l| la} ilustre L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} de iniciar las reparaciones, pensaron en la forma más rápida de evacuar en vez de en su deber.

languages.text: 然而，在那一刻改变主意的人，并不仅仅只有我一个。许多船员听到我们光辉伟大的舰长大人下令修理舰船的严厉命令之后，他们考虑的并不是自己的职责，而是如何以最快的方式逃出这艘舰船。
languages.original_text: However, I was not the only one to have a change of heart in that moment. Many crew members, upon hearing our illustrious Lord Captain's command to begin repairs, thought not upon their duty, but on the fastest way to abandon ship.

traits.locale_text: 然而，在那一刻改变主意的人，并不仅仅只有我一个。许多船员听到我们光辉伟大的舰长大人下令修理舰船的严厉命令之后，他们考虑的并不是自己的职责，而是如何以最快的方式逃出这艘舰船。

languages.text: しかし、その瞬間に気持ちが変わってしまったのは私だけではなかった。多くのクルーは、我が高潔なロード・キャプテンの修理開始の命令を聞いて、自分の任務ではなく、船を降りる最短経路を思い描いていた。
languages.original_text: However, I was not the only one to have a change of heart in that moment. Many crew members, upon hearing our illustrious Lord Captain's command to begin repairs, thought not upon their duty, but on the fastest way to abandon ship.

traits.locale_text: しかし、その瞬間に気持ちが変わってしまったのは私だけではなかった。多くのクルーは、我が高潔なロード・キャプテンの修理開始の命令を聞いて、自分の任務ではなく、船を降りる最短経路を思い描いていた。

languages.text: Ich war jedoch nicht der einzige, der in diesem Moment seine Meinung änderte. Viele Besatzungsmitglieder dachten, als sie den Befehl unseres erhabenen Herrn Kapitäns hörten, mit den Reparaturen zu beginnen, nicht an ihre Pflicht, sondern an den schnellsten Weg, das Schiff zu verlassen.
languages.original_text: However, I was not the only one to have a change of heart in that moment. Many crew members, upon hearing our illustrious Lord Captain's command to begin repairs, thought not upon their duty, but on the fastest way to abandon ship.

languages.text: Je n'étais pas le seul à être en proie au doute à ce moment-là. Lorsque notre illustre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} leur a donné l'ordre de commencer les réparations, de nombreux membres de l'équipage ont mis de côté leur sens du devoir pour réfléchir à la meilleure façon d'abandonner le navire.
languages.original_text: However, I was not the only one to have a change of heart in that moment. Many crew members, upon hearing our illustrious Lord Captain's command to begin repairs, thought not upon their duty, but on the fastest way to abandon ship.

traits.locale_text: Je n'étais pas le seul à être en proie au doute à ce moment-là. Lorsque notre illustre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} leur a donné l'ordre de commencer les réparations, de nombreux membres de l'équipage ont mis de côté leur sens du devoir pour réfléchir à la meilleure façon d'abandonner le navire.

languages.text: O an fikirleri değişen tek kişi ben değildim. Şanlı Lord Kaptanımızın onarım emrini duyan birçok tayfa, kendilerine verilen vazifeyi değil de gemiyi en hızlı terk edebilmenin yollarını düşündüler.
languages.original_text: However, I was not the only one to have a change of heart in that moment. Many crew members, upon hearing our illustrious Lord Captain's command to begin repairs, thought not upon their duty, but on the fastest way to abandon ship.

traits.locale_text: O an hisleri değişmeyen tek kişi ben değildim. Şanlı Lord Kaptan'ımızın emrini duyan birçok tayfa, onarımlara başladı ancak bunu görevleri öyle gerektirdiği için değil, gemiyi en hızlı şekilde terk edebilmek için yaptılar.
